FUNCTION gcd(a, b) RESULT(res)
    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: a, b
    INTEGER :: res, temp
    res = a
    DO WHILE (MOD(b, res) /= 0)
        temp = res
        res = MOD(b, temp)
        b = temp
    END DO
END FUNCTION gcd

FUNCTION gcd(a, b) RESULT(res)
    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: a, b
    INTEGER :: res, temp
    res = a
    DO WHILE (MOD(b, res) /= 0)
        temp = res
        res = MOD(b, temp)
        b = temp
    END DO
END FUNCTION gcd

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: x, y, a, b, GCD, LCM, first_output, remainder, i, count
    character(len=20) :: s, s2
    integer :: a1, a2, second_output, third_char_ascii
    integer :: second_output_val

    ! First program's logic
    read*, x, y, a, b

    GCD = gcd(x,y)
    LCM = (x*y)/GCD if (LCM > b) then
        first_output =0
    else
        remainder = mod(a, LCM) if (remainder ==0) then
            i = a
        else
            i = a + (LCM - remainder)
        end if
        if (i > b) then
            first_output =0
        else
            count = (b -i)/LCM +1
            first_output = count
        end if
    end if

    ! Second program's logic
    write(s, '(i0)') first_output
    s = adjustl(s)

    a1 =0
    do i=2, len_trim(s) if (s(i:i) == s(i-1:i-1)) then
            if (s(i:i) == '1') then
                s(i:i) = '0'
            else
                s(i:i) = '1'
            end if
            a1 = a1 +1
        end if
    end do

    a2 =0
    do i = len_trim(s), 2, -1
        if (s(i:i) == s(i-1:i-1)) then
            if (s(i-1:i-1) == '1') then
                s(i-1:i-1) = '0'
            else
                s(i-1:i-1) = '1'
            end if
            a2 = a2 +1
        end if
    end do

    second_output = min(a1, a2)

    ! Third program's logic
    write(s2, '(i0)') second_output
    s2 = adjustl(s2)

    third_char_ascii = ichar(s2(1:1))

FUNCTION gcd(a, b) RESULT(res)
    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: a, b
    INTEGER :: res, temp
    res = a
    DO WHILE (MOD(b, res) /= 0)
        temp = res
        res = MOD(b, temp)
        b = temp
    END DO
END FUNCTION gcd

FUNCTION gcd(a, b) RESULT(res)
    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: a, b
    INTEGER :: res, temp
    res = a
    DO WHILE (MOD(b, res) /= 0)
        temp = res
        res = MOD(b, temp)
        b = temp
    END DO
END FUNCTION gcd

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: x, y, a, b, GCD, LCM, first_output, remainder, i, count
    character(len=20) :: s, s2
    integer :: a1, a2, second_output, third_char_ascii
    integer :: second_output_val

    ! First program's logic
    read*, x, y, a, b

    GCD = gcd(x,y)
    LCM = (x*y)/GCD

    if (LCM > b) then
        first_output =0
    else
        remainder = mod(a, LCM)
        if (remainder ==0) then
            i = a
        else
            i = a + (LCM - remainder)
        end if
        if (i > b) then
            first_output =0
        else
            count = (b -i)/LCM +1
            first_output = count
        end if
    end if

    ! Second program's logic
    write(s, '(i0)') first_output
    s = adjustl(s)

    a1 =0
    do i=2, len_trim(s)
        if (s(i:i) == s(i-1:i-1)) then
            if (s(i:i) == '1') then
                s(i:i) = '0'
            else
                s(i:i) = '1'
            end if
            a1 = a1 +1
        end if
    end do

    a2 =0
    do i = len_trim(s), 2, -1
        if (s(i:i) == s(i-1:i-1)) then
            if (s(i-1:i-1) == '1') then
                s(i-1:i-1) = '0'
            else
                s(i-1:i-1) = '1'
            end if
            a2 = a2 +1
        end if
    end do

    second_output = min(a1, a2)

    ! Third program's logic
    write(s2, '(i0)') second_output
    s2 = adjustl(s2)

    third_char_ascii = ichar(s2(1:1)) +1
    print '(a)', achar(third_char_ascii)

end program main

FUNCTION gcd(a, b) RESULT(res)
    INTEGER, INTENT(IN) :: a, b
    INTEGER :: res, temp
    res = a
    DO WHILE (MOD(b, res) /= 0)
        temp = res
        res = MOD(b, temp)
        b = temp
    END DO
END FUNCTION gcd
